summary: unfinished tony stark/tenth doctor crossover
title: unfinished tony stark/tenth doctor crossover
body:
I’m posting some more in the fic graveyard because why not. Maybe someone will take an idea and run with it. Or maybe it’ll motivate me to actually finish one of these fics. This was going to be Tony/Ten and it was going to be SO HOT. damn it I need to be better about following through.this was a pretty great idea. I was smarter in 2013, I think.

***

He hurts, but he is marvelously comfortable.

Tony can’t remember which of his recent reckless decisions landed him in the hospital, but it must have been a fucking doozy because every single part of his body is Banshee-wailing in pain. He keeps his eyes shut for a moment; he hates post-concussive conversation, and he wants to know the answers when the nurse yells “What year is it” three inches from his face.

Only…

No monitors beeping. No hum of voices. Silence.

He opens his eyes.

“The fuck?” He struggles and props himself on one elbow, wincing at the fresh flare of pain in his neck.

He’s not in a hospital.

It’s a bedroom – at least, it’s a room with a bed. The walls are rusted metal, studded with rivets the size of watermelon halves, and the room itself is sort of shaped like the inside of an inverted ship: four-inch-wide ribs arcing smoothly toward the domed ceiling. Other than the bed, it is completely empty. That is, except for the Iron Man suit, which is in pieces against the wall.

Tony peeks under the sheets. He’s completely naked.

“Awesome,” he mutters.

He stands up slowly, leaning on the carved wooden headboard for support, and takes stock of his injuries. Neck sore, but – he pushes on the knobs of his spine, tentatively at first – likely no fractures. Muscle aches, check. His left hip is killing him, but it’s been fucked up since that spill he took in the Mark II, so he can’t blame –

“Oh God,” he says.

“The portal closed,” says a man’s voice from behind him.

Tony whirls. So does the room.

He staggers, and suddenly there are hands on him, easing him back down onto the bed. “There you are, right.”

Tony leans forward, gags.

“Put your head between your knees,” the man advises, and Tony could punch him, the smug British bastard. But he complies, and gradually the vertigo resolves.

“Better?”

Tony turns his head just enough to look up at the man sitting beside him. He’s slight and handsome, with shaggy dark hair and a neat, pinstriped suit, and he’s looking at Tony with an expression caught somewhere between amusement and concern.

“Mind telling me why I’m naked?” Tony says irritably. “Don’t mince words, really, especially if I owe anyone an apology.”

“Hm.” The man’s lips curl in a small smile. “I’m afraid the garments you were wearing when I brought you aboard were in rather abysmal shape. I had to extract you from that suit after the blast.”

“The portal closed.” The words finally sink in. “So the Earth – ”

“Safe as houses,” the man says. “You were slightly worse for the wear. I did what I could, but I’m afraid you may be feeling some residual discomfort.”

“That’s putting it lightly.” Tony sits up and pulls the sheet over his lap.

The man stands. “There are clothes just outside,” he says, indicating a door Tony hadn’t seen before, “and you’ll find a washroom around the corner. Take your time. When you’ve finished, I’ll be in the console room.”

By the time he finishes his sentence, the door is sliding closed.

“Console room?” Tony says, to no one.

It takes him a few more minutes to get to his feet, and when he gets to the door, he’s momentarily stumped. There’s no knob, no touch panel, nothing but a flat pane of silver metal on the right side of the doorframe. Experimentally, he presses his palm to it.

There’s a hissing, pneumatic sound, and the door opens.

He looks to the left, to the right. It’s a kind of atrium, in the same industrial style as the bedroom, and off to the right are clothes. Racks and racks of clothes, hung twenty feet high and twice as wide. Shoes, too, more pairs than Tony can count.

“You,” he says, pulling a pair of Chuck Taylors off the bottom shelf, “and…” a long-sleeved black T-shirt, jeans – “you.”

The bathroom looks almost exactly like the one in his first apartment, and in fact, when he reaches to turn the water on, he sees the chip in the tile where he dropped the detachable showerhead and it hit the wall. He’d wonder about it, but his head hurts and the hot spray of the water feels better than sex, so he puts it out of his mind.  

“Took you long enough,” the pinstriped Brit says, when Tony wanders into the console room.

“This is…” Tony stops, one hand on the wall, his eyes moving over the wires and panels and the column of light at the core of the TARDIS. “What is this?”

“Time machine.” The man flips a switch.

Tony shakes his head. “And who are you?”

Flash of a grin, gone in an instant. “I’m the Doctor.”

Tony blinks. “Doctor who?”

“So I’ve heard,” the Doctor says.

“Time machine,” Tony repeats. He sinks painfully to the floor.

The Doctor saunters over to Tony and drops to the floor beside him. “S'called the TARDIS,” he explains. “Time and Relative Dimensions in Space.”

“Not really what I expected a time machine to look like,” Tony says, leaning back on his hands and letting his gaze wander over the console room.

“You don’t seem surprised,” the Doctor says.

Tony sees, out of the corner of his eye, the narrow, assessing look on the Doctor’s face.  He grins. “Well. It’s not the first encounter I’ve had with…relative dimensions.”

“Build that suit yourself?” The Doctor jerks his chin in the direction of the bedroom.

“Yeah, why, want one?”

“Thanks, no.” The Doctor’s gaze hasn’t left Tony’s face. His eyes are wide and dark and serious. “May I ask you a question?”

“Haven’t you been already?” Tony lets his hands slide across the floor away from his body, until he’s lying flat on his back.

“If that arc reactor comes out, would it kill you?”

Tony sits up and looks sharply at the Doctor, one hand automatically going to his chest to cover the arc reactor. “What do you know about it?”

“Don’t get defensive,” the Doctor says placatingly. He springs to his feet. “It was just a bit…disarming…to see it in person.”

“What do you mean, in person?”

“We-ell.” The Doctor shrugs a little. “You know. I’d heard about it, and all, but I had a hard time believing that twenty-first century humans would be able to come up with something so…innovative.”

“You know what they say about necessity, it’s a motherfucker.” Tony fixes the Doctor with a hard stare. “Or something like that.”

“Something indeed.” The Doctor doesn’t blink or look away.

Finally Tony clears his throat. “You want to take me back to Earth, or what? Because my team is probably going to, you know, wonder where I am.”

“I can’t quite yet, I’m afraid,” the Doctor says. “I was actually on a rather urgent mission. I was hoping to arrive at the Chitauri entry point prior to the invasion, but I was unavoidably delayed.”

This was going to be Tony/Ten and it was going to be SO HOT. damn it I need to be better about following through.this was a pretty great idea. I was smarter in 2013, I think.

Finally Tony clears his throat. “You want to take me back to Earth, or what? Because my team is probably going to, you know, wonder where I am.”

“I can’t quite yet, I’m afraid,” the Doctor says. “I was actually on a rather urgent mission. I was hoping to arrive at the Chitauri entry point prior to the invasion, but I was unavoidably delayed.”
trail.content_abstract:
I’m posting some more in the fic graveyard because why not. Maybe someone will take an idea and run with it. Or maybe it’ll motivate me to actually finish one of these fics. This was going to be Tony/Ten and it was going to be SO HOT. damn it I need to be better about following through.this was a pretty great idea. I was smarter in 2013, I think.

***

He hurts, but he is marvelously comfortable.

Tony can’t remember which of his recent reckless decisions landed him in the hospital, but it must have been a fucking doozy because every single part of his body is Banshee-wailing in pain. He keeps his eyes shut for a moment; he hates post-concussive conversation, and he wants to know the answers when the nurse yells “What year is it” three inches from his face.

Only…

No monitors beeping. No hum of voices. Silence.

He opens his eyes.

“The fuck?” He struggles and props himself on one elbow, wincing at the fresh flare of pain in his neck.

He’s not in a hospital.

It’s a bedroom – at least, it’s a room with a bed. The walls are rusted metal, studded with rivets the size of watermelon halves, and the room itself is sort of shaped like the inside of an inverted ship: four-inch-wide ribs arcing smoothly toward the domed ceiling. Other than the bed, it is completely empty. That is, except for the Iron Man suit, which is in pieces against the wall.

summary: Steve threw down the tiny notebook he had been keeping to write things down, things he’d missed, things people thought he should...
body:
Steve threw down the tiny notebook he had been keeping to write things down, things he’d missed, things people thought he should know. He frowned at the Avengers, and when Steve frowned, you felt it in your soul.

‘What’s… what happened, Steve-o?’ Tony asked, a little perturbed despite himself. ‘We forget to tell you about James Bond?’

Steve’s frown got deeper, but less angry, and he looked down at the notebook as though it were the one that had betrayed him.

‘Disneyland,’ he said. ‘Nobody told me about Disneyland. How is that not the most important thing I missed?’

‘What is Disneyland?’ Thor asked brightly. ‘Should we go there?’

‘…Yes,’ Tony said, for once actually feeling regretful. Disneyland, of course they should have taken Steve to Disneyland. God, here they were suggesting all this jaded grown-up shit, and they’d completely forgotten the fact that Disneyland was a huge thing Steve had missed entirely, start to finish.

‘We should all go,’ Tony went on.

‘What? No,’ Banner pushed away from the table. ‘No, no, no, I am not going to Disneyland.’

‘It’s the Happiest Place On Earth, c’mon.’

‘Tony.’

‘Oh fine. We’ll take Pete instead.’

I am a potter head and my hogwarts houses are Slytherin and Hufflepuff. I write Sweet!Loki x Reader fluff mostly. Feel free to also go check out my Wattpad, ShawnerificPotter.

summary: Is This Love? (Loki x Reader)
title: Is This Love? (Loki x Reader)
body:
Sad but has fluff with soft Loki, ya’ll know me ;) xD

Pairing: Loki x Pregnant! Asgardian! Wife! Reader

Warning: Kinda Angst, Sad, mentions of child death, but has happy ending :) 

Imagine you are his wife and you and him are plotting to take over Midgard (Earth) When the Avengers tried to stop you two, they kill you, Loki was caught and he was mad and heart broken. The Avengers found out who you were and that secretly, you were pregnant with his child. The Avengers feel bad for him (And understood that Thanos is behind? I don’t know I’ll add it probably) so they decided to make it up to him…in the best way possible.

“Y/N?” Loki gasped as he walked over to your heavily wounded form laying on your bed, your eyes half closed, slowly loosing life it was once filled with.

You tried your hardest to fight this battle for life, a battle you know you are too weak to fight, but you tried, for him.

Yet, it was hopeless.

You were attacked by non other than the Avengers…who thought you as Loki’s apprentice, his assistant who will help him in his scheme to take over earth.

Unbeknowst to them, you were just his innocent sweet wife, trying to stop him and bring him back home.

It ended in you been stabbed by the black widow, in the stomach…where your little boy was growing.

Tears streamed down his cheeks as a sob escaped his lips. He couldn’t believe what he was seeing.

“Lllllooookkiiiii” you tried to muster up, you know you are slowly loosing your life, so you want to spend at least these few last minutes, with him closer to you.

“No, no no no no…no! I refuse to believe this.” he said as he shook his head, more tears pouring out of his eyes.

“Loki….please….” you begged for him to hold your hand as you held it out, hanging over the edge of the bed.

You whimpered, not only for the stinging pain of your wounds, but for the even more painful feeling that took over your heart.

He knelt down beside you, taking your hand in his as he kissed the back of it, letting more tears out. 

“Please tell me this is all a dream.” he begged it was, he so badly did.

You cupped his face with your hand as you wiped the tears away from his cheeks.

“Nnnno….I-I-I aam sooo sooorrry…” you formed the words somehow.

“Nooo…”he whispered painfully as he held onto your hand that was on his cheek. “Please no…I can’t-I can’t loose you Y/N…”

“I-I am afffraid ittt’ss tooo laaate, m-mmyy loooveee…”you whispered, feeling warm tears stream down your face.

“No it’s not…no it’s not. I know you will live Y/N. I will save you…” he sobbed, tears pouring out of his eyes again. But no matter how much you tried to wipe them away, they were replaced with even more.

His heart broke into millions of pieces. He knew there is nothing he could do to help you, but no matter what, he refused to give up.

He then placed both his hands a top the stab wound on your belly, a golden glow escaping his palm as he desperately tried to heal the wound.

But nothing worked.

His hand covered his face as he sobbed into them.

Your weakly lifted your hand to place it on his head, stroking and running your fingers through his soft black hair.

He removed his hands to stare into your face that held a soft loving smile.

“Oh my love…” he whimpered as he buried his head into the crook of your neck, sobbing hard as he held your close.

“Y/N…my darling wife…please, I beg you, please, don’t leave…” he sobbed.

You pulled him away, letting him lay down next you.

“I-i-iI w-woooould neeeeveer leeeave yooou Loooooki, y-you knowwww t-thattt rrrrrright? Y-y-you k-know that eeeeven aaaafter d-d-death, Iiii w-w-will aaaaalwaysssss r-r-remain, in here…” you said placing your hand on top of his chest, where his heart laid. 

(Translation: I would never leave you Loki, you know that right? You know that even after death, I will always remain, in here…)

His hand placed a top yours. 

“I-I…Y/N…I…” he didn’t know what say.

“Shhhhhh…I-It’ssss f-f-fine Looookiiii…” you comforted him.

He bought you closer to him, sobbing uncontrollably as he whispered sweet nothings to your ear.

“I love you sweetheart…I love you my darling love, Y/N….” he sobbed, never wanting to let go of you.

“I-I Llllove y-y-you toooo, mmmy k-k-kinnggg….” you breathed as you brought a hand to place it over your wounded belly.

“A-and sooo d-doesss h-heeee.”

Loki head shot up. “W-what?” 

“Y-y-your s-s-son Loooki…o-ouurrr little P-prince t-that uuuused to-to-to g-grow iiiinsiiiide thiiiiis beeelllly…” 

(Translation: Your son Loki, out little prince that used to grow inside this belly…)

His bottom lip quivered, shaking his head in disbelief. 

“No…no! why? Why!?” he sobbed.

“I-I-I aaaammmm soooo sorrry…”

He didn’t say another word as he buried his head into your chest, continuing to sob as he rubbed your belly.

“How could they…? How could they take you two away from me…? “ he sobbed.

You held him closer to you, kissing his head.

You knew there was a few more minutes left. You shook his form to grab his attention.

“W-what i-is it my lovely queen?” he tried so hard not to sob again, yet it was obvious he is failing, 

“C-c-can youuu taaaake m-m-me toooo seee theee starssss, onnneee laaaast t-t-time?” you asked.

(Translation: Can you take me to see the stars one last time?)

He nodded. “Anything for you, my sweet Y/N…” he let out a held back sob as he sat up, picking you up bridal style as he carefully carried you across the room, all the way over to the window seat.

He laid you down as he opened the window. He then sat down, bringing you to lay across his lap as he held you close, both staring out at the twinkling stars.

“H-heee m-m-mussst beee thee swwee-test angel uuup t-t-there.” you said, your breathing rate decreasing.

(Translation: He must be the sweetest angel up there.)

“Indeed…” Loki said, holding back the sobs, but instead letting tears out since it pricked his already red eyes.

He held you close, cradling your head in his hands…knowing your only seconds away from joining those stars above…and his and your little miracle that never got to see the world…”

He heard you whimper, which made him sob, he knew the time has come.

“Let go my love. Let go and be free…” he said, sobbing as he brushed your H/C hair out of your face, looking into your E/C eyes one last time.

“I-I-I love, fffforever, Looooki…” you said as a tear escaped your eyes, before they closed forever, and your hands hanged to your sides, lifeless.

He sobbed harder as he held you even closer, rocking you back and forth. He couldn’t believe you were gone. All because of his brother and stupid mortal friends…

“I-I love you sooo muuuch Y/N. I will never forget you and all the things you have done for me.” he sobbed as he placed a kiss on your finger, right above your wedding ring, “I love you….and I will complete our mission, I will take over Midgard, just for you.” he promised you before kissing your cold lips one more time.


-


That was months ago. A memory that never left Loki’s mind, even when he is trapped inside a Hulk-proof glass prison in the the helicare.

He paced back and forth, thinking about you…he never stopped thinking about you…

He felt a presence behind him. A smirk formed on his lips, hiding the sadness that his heart held onto.

(WHY YOU DO THIS TO ME LOKI!?!?!?!?!?!?!? ^^^^)

“Surprisingly, me too.” Clint said.

Maybe if she was still alive, Loki could have been that person with us, and with me! He could be our good friend as well.” Thor said, a bit excitedly.

“No, my love. You have done nothing wrong but repair my broken heart.” he said as he placed his lips over yours, kissing you, tasting your sweet lips as he savored it.

“And…” he said pulling away as his hand rubbed over your now flat belly. He felt sadness take over him…his son didn’t make it after all…

Y/N sighed as she placed her hands over his.

“Don’t worry about it Loki, his safe.” you said, a smile placing it self over your lips.

“I know love. As you said, he must be the sweetest angel up there.” Loki said, still holding you close as his forehead was pressed against yours.

You giggled. “That is not what I mean’t” you said as you took his hand in your, taking him towards the crib.

His eyes lit up in realization as more tears poured out of his eyes. You pulled him towards the crib as now he stood in front of it, his eyes landing on a cute little bundle wrapped in silky green sheets.

“He was born last night. S/N Lokison…” you said, giggling at Loki’s reaction.

He looked down and S/N in awe.

Loki picked him up and held your son close, chuckling in disbelief.

“S/N…S/N Lokison…my very own son…” he mumbled as he rocked him back and forth, swinging from side to side.

“This surely is some dream, everything is so unreal.” he mumbled, tears pouring out of his eyes as he held his finger out, S/N grabbed it as he smiled up at his father.

“Yet so real.” you added. 

Loki’s eyes softened as he pulled you close by the hips, holding his son at the other.

“I love you Y/N, and I love you S/N…” he said, too overwhelmed to ever look at them as he closed his eyes.

“And we love you too…we will never leave you again.” you said, snuggling closer to him. 

“it’s a beautiful dream, that I don’t have to wake up, that will never fade away into a blur. It’s a real beautiful dream…”

He forgot about everything, his he did in the past, what he is known to be, what he really is. All that mattered to him was his wife and son, who he will love and protect until his last breath is taken.

She also had a golden flower crown, the same one he gave Y/N, and the same one she wore on their wedding day…

“What is the meaning of this broth-” Loki stopped once her face turned towards him, and their eyes met.

Familiar E/C eyes, S/C skin and a F/S face, and most importantly, her smile…

That smile he had had for a year now, that smile that haunted his dreams, plastered itself on her lips as she ran towards him.

She hands wrapped them around Loki’s neck. He however did not hug back for he couldn’t believe what was happening.

He didn’t move an inch, he felt like his body was made of stones, he felt like his feet are stuck to the ground. His mind was blank in shock.

“Loki?” Y/N said as she pulled away, confused and worried on why he didn’t hug her back. “Are you okay?” she asked, cupping his cheeks.

And when the message was processed, his mind awoke from it’s blank state, his rock like stiff body softened, and his legs grew weak, as his eyes brimmed with long held tears, that are now filled with only happiness and joy.

“Y/N…” he whispered, the bouquet of roses falling down to the floor as he bought her into his embrace, holding her close as if she would disappear again if he let go.

Y/N happily wrapped her arms around his neck as she held him tight, running her hands through his hair as she felt warm tears fall onto her bare shoulder.

A few of her own tears fell down, she may have not been there to experience Loki’s state after her supposed death, but she knew enough to know what his state would have been.

“H-How?” he asked as he pulled away, his arms still wrapped around her waist.

“Your brother, Stephan Strange and the Avengers traveled back in time and bought me here. They explained everything to me. I’m sorry I put you through all that.”

Loki shook his head as he placed his forehead over yours. 

“No, my love. You have done nothing wrong but repair my broken heart.” he said as he placed his lips over yours, kissing you, tasting your sweet lips as he savored it.

“And…” he said pulling away as his hand rubbed over your now flat belly. He felt sadness take over him…his son didn’t make it after all…

Y/N sighed as she placed her hands over his.

“Don’t worry about it Loki, his safe.” you said, a smile placing it self over your lips.

“I know love. As you said, he must be the sweetest angel up there.” Loki said, still holding you close as his forehead was pressed against yours.

You giggled. “That is not what I mean’t” you said as you took his hand in your, taking him towards the crib.

His eyes lit up in realization as more tears poured out of his eyes. You pulled him towards the crib as now he stood in front of it, his eyes landing on a cute little bundle wrapped in silky green sheets.

“He was born last night. S/N Lokison…” you said, giggling at Loki’s reaction.

He looked down and S/N in awe.

Loki picked him up and held your son close, chuckling in disbelief.

“S/N…S/N Lokison…my very own son…” he mumbled as he rocked him back and forth, swinging from side to side.

“This surely is some dream, everything is so unreal.” he mumbled, tears pouring out of his eyes as he held his finger out, S/N grabbed it as he smiled up at his father.

“Yet so real.” you added. 

Loki’s eyes softened as he pulled you close by the hips, holding his son at the other.

“I love you Y/N, and I love you S/N…” he said, too overwhelmed to ever look at them as he closed his eyes.

“And we love you too…we will never leave you again.” you said, snuggling closer to him. 

“it’s a beautiful dream, that I don’t have to wake up, that will never fade away into a blur. It’s a real beautiful dream…”

He forgot about everything, his he did in the past, what he is known to be, what he really is. All that mattered to him was his wife and son, who he will love and protect until his last breath is taken.


Too much fluff, I know xD But I hope ya’ll enjoyed it.

“And…” he said pulling away as his hand rubbed over your now flat belly. He felt sadness take over him…his son didn’t make it after all…

Y/N sighed as she placed her hands over his.

“Don’t worry about it Loki, his safe.” you said, a smile placing it self over your lips.

“I know love. As you said, he must be the sweetest angel up there.” Loki said, still holding you close as his forehead was pressed against yours.

You giggled. “That is not what I mean’t” you said as you took his hand in your, taking him towards the crib.

His eyes lit up in realization as more tears poured out of his eyes. You pulled him towards the crib as now he stood in front of it, his eyes landing on a cute little bundle wrapped in silky green sheets.

“He was born last night. S/N Lokison…” you said, giggling at Loki’s reaction.

He looked down and S/N in awe.

Loki picked him up and held your son close, chuckling in disbelief.

“S/N…S/N Lokison…my very own son…” he mumbled as he rocked him back and forth, swinging from side to side.

“This surely is some dream, everything is so unreal.” he mumbled, tears pouring out of his eyes as he held his finger out, S/N grabbed it as he smiled up at his father.

“Yet so real.” you added. 

Loki’s eyes softened as he pulled you close by the hips, holding his son at the other.

“I love you Y/N, and I love you S/N…” he said, too overwhelmed to ever look at them as he closed his eyes.

“And we love you too…we will never leave you again.” you said, snuggling closer to him. 

“it’s a beautiful dream, that I don’t have to wake up, that will never fade away into a blur. It’s a real beautiful dream…”

He forgot about everything, his he did in the past, what he is known to be, what he really is. All that mattered to him was his wife and son, who he will love and protect until his last breath is taken.


Too much fluff, I know xD But I hope ya’ll enjoyed it.
trail.content_abstract:
Sad but has fluff with soft Loki, ya’ll know me ;) xD

Pairing: Loki x Pregnant! Asgardian! Wife! Reader

Warning: Kinda Angst, Sad, mentions of child death, but has happy ending :) 

Imagine you are his wife and you and him are plotting to take over Midgard (Earth) When the Avengers tried to stop you two, they kill you, Loki was caught and he was mad and heart broken. The Avengers found out who you were and that secretly, you were pregnant with his child. The Avengers feel bad for him (And understood that Thanos is behind? I don’t know I’ll add it probably) so they decided to make it up to him…in the best way possible.
